Title: BERNEY Two Tone 1910 Renault Open Face POCKET WATCH New!
Description: BERNEY Two Tone 1910 Renault Open Face POCKET WATCH New! Swedemom is proud to present this marvelous 1910 Renault Pocket Watch from Berney. One of the premier Swiss watch making families, BERNEY has been manufacturing timepieces of exceptional quality for many years. These exquisite pieces (CASES and MOVEMENTS) are manufactured and assembled entirely at the factory in La Vallee' de Joux in Switzerland. The gold-colored 36mm dial (face) is signed "Berney," "Quartz," and "Swiss." It bears black ROMAN NUMERALS, hour, and minute hands and a gold second hand. A small window above the "6" shows the date. The 45mm gold overlay case features a medallion on the back with a raised, pewter portrait of a 1910 Renault. The 35mm white clock face has black Roman Numerals and minute and hour hands, and a gold second hand. This battery operated pocketwatch is a brand new. Feel free to contact us for a combined invoice with the shipping discount applied. Swedemoms hours are 8am to 5pm PST Monday-Friday.We are closed on weekends and major holidays.

Charity.Mission: MacHub is a division of Yamhill County Gospel Rescue Mission. MacHub partners with YCGRM to provide needed shelter, support, hope, and job opportunities. MacHub is changing community fund-raising by facilitating the sale of high-value contributions and passing proceeds on to nonprofits in the community. We thank our supporters and we welcome your ongoing support of our efforts!
